about_the_game:
If you thought that this is going to be another game in a post-apocalyptic universe where people now are forced to colonize other planets, you're absolutely wrong. This game is entirely unique in this genre, as you are able to play on any supported platform and keep playing on others. Come back anytime you want, no progress will be lost. HD graphics and mesmerizing sound effects and simulation features are playable on all featured devices.

Have you ever wondered what a world would look like in which you can continue constructing your astonishing city no matter where you are? On which device you are on? We hereby present you the solution: nStations. Available for smartphones as well.

Say NO to microtransactions! NO pay to win! This game is a promise to all those who abhor spending extra money to gain progress.

Watch our full preview trailer and see what is waiting for you in this amazing game.
